title: HELP PLS
body:
hello, recently bought a mac book pro and have downloaded league. however the problem I'm facing is when i double click on the icon, league of legends pops up on the bottom but then  after few seconds, it disappears and then nothing happens after that,,,,

Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Hey PentaPark, 

This is likely due to a connection issue between your client and the League of Legends servers. Please try disabling any firewalls and/or anti-virus applications you may have running and try opening your client again. If the issue persists, please try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article.
